page.title: 07BURTREE CARAVANS
page.content: NEXT TO THE BURTREE INN ON THE A68 IS BURTREE CARAVANS.BURTREE CARAVANS SELL A MULTITUDE OF DIFFERENT PRODUCTS ASSOCIATED WITH HOLIDAYS AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES.THESE INCLUDE THE BUYING AND SELLING OF CARAVANS,AND CARAVAN ACCESSORIES.THE SALE OF TENTS AND TRAILERS AND CAMPING ACCESSORIES.ALSO SALE OF RUBBER DINGHYS,SMALL SAILING DINGHYS AND SAIL BOARDS.THERE IS A HUGE INDOOR SHOWROOM WITH TENTS AND ACCESSORIES COVERING OVER HALF AN ACRE AND OUTSIDE THERE IS A PARK OF SEVERAL HUNDRED CARAVANS COVERING AN AREA OF OVER TWO ACRES.THEY SELL BOTH NEW AND OLD CARAVANS OFTEN ACQUIRING THEIR USED ONES BY TAKING THEM IN AS PART EXCHANGE FOR NEW ONES.THE PUBLIC ARE INVITED TO ENTER THE SALES ROOMS AND PARK AREA AND STROLL AROUND AT THEIR LEISURE AND EXAMINE THE STOCK WITHOUT AND COMMITMENT TO MAKE A PURCHASE.
